After the game went F2P, the amount of cheaters in Competitive is way too high to be any fun.  Its a terrible design to force people to play with cheaters or punish them with cooldowns.

Yes I have a "Verified Account"/"Premium Matchmaking" whatever.  It doesn't mean much apparently.

Look at my hours.  It used to be worth tolerating cheaters, not anymore.
